page.title: 07INDUSTRY IN MARLBOROUGH
page.content: Many small industries flourish here. There is a leather factory which processes leather brought from Brazil and India and then sells this processed leather, mainly to the shoe industry. The toy industry is represented by two firms making wooden toys, and another making puppets. A pottery (whose markets are almost exclusively in the U.S.A.) a guitar maker and a furniture restorer are other examples. There is a factory making ladies' underwear, and another manufacturing hang gliders. There is also a farrier, panel beater, welder, tyre fitter and a small firm of electrical engineers. Many of these small firms are situated in Wagon Yard, off London road.
